body.p: Grayson County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Matilda Johnson. Father of Benjamin H. Johnson, Thomas W. Johnson, Christopher Johnson, James W. Johnson, Milvilla Johnson, Marcilla Johnson, Alexander Johnson, Sarah F. Johnson, George W. Johnson, Phillip Johnson, Robert Johnson, and M. J. Johnson. Farmer in Grayson County in 1850 and 1860.
